title: EWU CSE Department Launches Advanced Cybersecurity Course
summary: East West University's CSE department introduces a new advanced course on Cybersecurity, focusing on threat analysis and ethical hacking, available from Spring 2024.

title: BUET Robotics Team Wins International Competition
summary: The robotics team from Bangladesh University of Engineering and Technology (BUET) secured first place in the 'RoboChallenge Asia 2023' held in Singapore.

title: Dhaka University CSE Hosts Workshop on Machine Learning
summary: A hands-on workshop on 'Applied Machine Learning with Python' was successfully conducted by the CSE department of Dhaka University, attracting over 200 participants.

title: NSU Announces Inter-University Programming Contest 'CodeSprint 2024'
summary: North South University's CSE department has officially announced 'CodeSprint 2024', an inter-university programming contest. Registrations open next month.

title: EWU Professor Awarded Grant for AI Research
summary: Dr. Jane Doe from EWU's CSE department has received a significant research grant to explore innovative applications of AI in healthcare.

title: JU CSE Department Organizes Seminar on Quantum Computing
summary: A seminar on the 'Future of Quantum Computing' was held at Jahangirnagar University, featuring guest speakers from leading tech companies.

title: CUET Students Develop Smart City Solution Prototype
summary: A team of CSE students from Chittagong University of Engineering and Technology (CUET) presented their innovative smart city solution prototype at a national tech fair.

title: SUST CSE Alumni Meetup 2023 Scheduled for December
summary: Shahjalal University of Science and Technology (SUST) CSE department is organizing its annual alumni meetup in December. All alumni are invited to register.

title: BRAC University Partners with Tech Giant for Internship Program
summary: BRAC University's CSE department has partnered with a leading multinational tech company to offer exclusive internship opportunities for its students.

title: EWU CSE Fest 2023 Concludes Successfully
summary: The annual CSE Fest at East West University concluded with a grand prize-giving ceremony, showcasing innovative projects and competitive programming skills.
